mapper.select: select auto_increment from information_schema.`TABLES` WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA='ssm' AND TABLE_NAME='article'
mapper.insert: insert into article(authorId, title, releaseDate, modifyDate, content, likes, views) values (#{authorId}, #{title}, #{releaseDate}, #{modifyDate}, #{content}, #{likes}, #{views})
mapper.select: select * from article as a,tags as t where t.articleId = a.id and t.tag = #{tag}
